sentence: In a study of analyst recommendations at the major brokerages, for the underlying components of the S&P 500, Salesforce.com Inc (Symbol: CRM) has taken over the #15 spot from AMETEK Inc (Symbol: AME), according to ETF Channel .

Below is a chart of Salesforce.com Inc versus AMETEK Inc plotting their respective rank within the S&P 500 over time (CRM plotted in blue; AME plotted in green):

Below is a three month price history chart comparing the stock performance of CRM vs. AME:

CRM is currently trading up about 1%, while AME is down about 0.5% midday Tuesday.
